product.name: 2" X 10' Cast Iron No-Hub Soil Pipe
product.productOverview: Pipe; Nominal Pipe Size 2"; Length 10'; End Connection No Hub x No Hub; Material Gray Cast Iron; Material Specification ASTM A888, CISPI 301; Temperature Rating 212 Deg F; Application DWV, Sewer and Storm Drainage; Applicable Standard NSF, ISO 9001; Warranty 5 Year Limited
product.featuresAndBenefits: Cast Iron is the Premier Piping Material; It has been Used for Hundreds of Years and is for Non-Pressure Applications; It is the Most Durable DWV Piping System Available and Can be Used in All Types of Construction; It has High Crush Strength, Noncombustible and Offers Superior Sound-Deadening Performance; 5 Year Limited Warranty
